name: Suspicious Tri-Flavored Skewer
desc: A pieced-together skewer. The burnt bamboo stick and the dull-colored ingredients give off a smell that must not be named. If you were to make this out in the wild, you might just attract some hilichurls...

value.text: Increases all party members' ATK by 160 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

customize.name: Recipe: Tri-Flavored Skewer
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Tri-Flavored Skewer.

customize.name: Raw Meat
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

customize.name: Bird Egg
customize.desc: An incredibly versatile ingredient that can supply all of your daily protein needs.

customize.name: Flour
customize.desc: A powder ground from wheat. No matter what it goes into, it brings a sense of satisfaction to the diner.

customize.name: Snapdragon
customize.desc: Can be eaten once cooked. As a spice, it can bring wonderful flavor to dishes.

customize.name: Tri-Flavored Skewer
customize.desc: A pieced-together skewer. Three different cooking processes can be tasted at a go in this dish, which has made it very popular. If you are ever at a loss at to what to pair with some wine, there's no going wrong with one of these.

customize.name: Delicious Tri-Flavored Skewer
customize.desc: A pieced-together skewer. The highly-refined temperature control has released sizzling blooms of oils. The many seasonings accentuate the flavor of the various ingredients. If there was but a little less of them, it would be too plain; if a little more, too dense. This keen balance reveals the craftsman's heart within the chef.
